Package index

Predictions and classification

Functions for calculating predictions and classification

rict()
Run the River Invertebrate Classification Tool (RICT)
rict_predict()
Calculate River Invertebrate Classification Tool (RICT) predictions
rict_classify()
Calculate classification

Compare

Function for comparing two or more classification results

rict_compare()
Compare the Statistical Differences between Classifications Results

Example Datasets

Example datasets for different areas and model inputs for the UK

demo_ni_observed_values
Demo observed values for physical model in Northern Ireland
demo_observed_values
Demo observed values for physical model in Great Britain
demo_gis_values_log
Demo observed values for gis model
demo_iom_observed_values
Demo observed values for physical model for Isle of Man

Launch RICT web app

Demo RICT web app interactive web app for rict package

rict_app()
Open RICT web app

Helper functions

Used for testing and examples

rict_validate()
Validate observed values
compare_probability()
Compare Proportion of Results in each Class
compare_test()
A Statistical Test to Compare Two Results
demo_eqr_values
Demo simulated eqr values for Model 1 test sites
osg_parse()
Converts OS Grid Reference to BNG/WGS coordinates.
